actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: To remove inappropriate limitations on work requirements and to enhance waiver authority for welfare reform demonstration projects for the Food Stamp Program.
short_title: Food Stamp Employment and Flexibility Amendments of 1992

summary.text: Food Stamp Employment and Flexibility Amendments of 1992 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to: (1) revise specified food stamp program employment provisions; and (2) repeal specified pilot project limitations regarding income, resource, or benefit reductions.

titles.title: Food Stamp Employment and Flexibility Amendments of 1992
To remove inappropriate limitations on work requirements and to enhance waiver authority for welfare reform demonstration projects for the Food Stamp Program.
